name: Beggarlike
description:
Game made in two weeks by Giulio Martella and Andrea "Nedra" Settimii for the GameLoop Jam #0 using only Kenney's 1-Bit Pack.

Heavily inspired by the card game called "War", this roguelike lets you fight monsters with a deck of customizable cards. Steal cards from the defeated foes and improve the ones you have with the equipment you find in chests.

Music by:

https://captiveportalmusic.com/
https://hadokowa.bandcamp.com/
